snippet: Tom Whalley, a former head of Warner Brothers Records whose résumé includes signing Tupac Shakur and Nine Inch Nails, gets a new label with Universal.
abstract: Tom Whalley, a former head of Warner Brothers Records whose résumé includes signing Tupac Shakur and Nine Inch Nails, gets a new label with Universal.

headline.main: Executive Turntable: Universal Hires Former Warner Brothers Boss
